mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN gender = "여" THEN 1 END) AS female, COUNT(CASE WHEN gender = "남" THEN 1 END) AS male FROM user_info

SELECT COUNT(*) AS today, COUNT(CASE WHEN joindate < '${now}' THEN 1 END) AS oneDaysAgo, COUNT(CASE WHEN joindate < DATE_ADD('${now}', INTERVAL -1 DAY) THEN 1 END) AS yesterday, COUNT(CASE WHEN joindate < DATE_ADD('${now}', INTERVAL -2 DAY) THEN 1 END) AS twoDaysAgo, COUNT(CASE WHEN joindate < DATE_ADD('${now}', INTERVAL -3 DAY) THEN 1 END) AS threeDaysAgo, COUNT(CASE WHEN joindate < DATE_ADD('${now}', INTERVAL -4 DAY) THEN 1 END) AS fourDaysAgo, COUNT(CASE WHEN joindate < DATE_ADD('${now}', INTERVAL -5 DAY) THEN 1 END) AS fiveDaysAgo, COUNT(CASE WHEN joindate < DATE_ADD('${now}', INTERVAL -6 DAY) THEN 1 END) AS sixDaysAgo from user_info;

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN logintype = "google" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS google, COUNT(CASE WHEN logintype = "kakao" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS kakao, COUNT(CASE WHEN logintype = "github" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS github FROM user_info
select count(*) from user_info where enabled = 1
select count(*) from group_info where enabled = 1
select count(catename) as totalInterest from user_interest left join interest_category ic on ic.catecode = user_interest.catecode group by catename order by totalInterest desc limit 1
select ic.catename as topInterest from user_interest left join interest_category ic on ic.catecode = user_interest.catecode group by catename order by count(catename) desc limit 1

select COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "A" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS outdoor, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "B" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS exercises, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "C" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS book, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "D" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS language, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "E" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS culture, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "F" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS music, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "G" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS crafting, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "H" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS dance, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "I" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS voluntary, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "J" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS social, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "K" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS car, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "L" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS picture, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "M" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS game, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "N" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS cook, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "O" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS pet, COUNT(CASE WHEN catecode = "P" and enabled = 1 THEN 1 END) AS etc from user_info left join user_interest ui on user_info.userid = ui.userid
select group_name as title, xcoord, ycoord from group_schedule left join group_info gi on gi.group_no = group_schedule.group_no;
